info.title: Based Programming Project REST API - JefYamba
info.description: OpenApi documentation for Internet Based Programming Project

get.summary: Get all the users [For admin only]

put.summary: Update a user [For admin or current logged user only]
Change user's password [For current logged user only]

get.summary: Get all the messages [For admin only]

put.summary: Update a message [For current logged user as sender only]

post.summary: Send a message [For current logged user as sender only]

post.description: register a new book  [For admin only]

get.summary: Get user by Id [For admin or current logged user only]
get.description: fetch a user using the id

post.summary: Register user image profile [For admin or current logged user only]
post.description: set an image profile for an existing user

get.description: fetch a book using the id

post.summary: Register book image cover  [For admin only]
post.description: set an image cover for an existing book

get.summary: Get message by Id [For admin or current logged user as sender/receiver only]
get.description: fetch a message using the id

get.summary: Get messages by sender  [For admin or current logged user as sender only]
get.description: Fetch a page of messages by sender using sender id

get.summary: Get messages by receiver [For admin or current logged user as receiver only]
get.description: Fetch a page of messages by receiver using receiver id

get.summary: Get all the admin messages [For admin only]
get.description: Fetch a page of messages for admins

get.summary: Get User image profile [For admin or current logged only]
get.description: fetch a user's image profile using the image complete name
fetch a book's image cover using the image complete name

get.summary: Get all the books ordered by the latest
get.description: Fetch a page of books ordered by the latest
fetch a announcement using the id
